question: Which among the following is a correct statement?
option1: Only President can grant pardon to a person awarded death sentence and a person punished under Martial Law
option2: Both President & Governor can grant pardon to a person awarded death sentence and a person punished under Martial Law
option3: President can grant pardon to a person awarded death sentence and Governor can grant pardon to a person punished under Martial Law
option4: Only President can grant pardon to a person awarded death sentence and a person punished under Martial Law, However Governor can grant pardon a person punished under martial law
answer: Only President can grant pardon to a person awarded death sentence and a person punished under Martial Law
explanation: Only the President of India can grant pardon to a person awarded death sentence and a person punished under Martial Law in India.
